rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles. Incorporates natural light and open space.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area designed for social gatherings with industrial design aesthetics using raw materials like exposed brick and steel accents.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Functional dining space adjacent to the living room with a minimalist design complementing industrial interiors.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated with smart appliances and an open layout for efficiency and interaction with other living spaces. Industrial elements are subtly incorporated.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring a peaceful ambiance with soundproofing and ample storage space to meet industrial aesthetics and comfort needs.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom with sufficient lighting and ventilation. Industrial elements like exposed beams are used for design interest.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space designed with built-in shelving, comfortable seating and ample lighting to create a serene reading environment. Incorporates Vastu principles for knowledge and creativity.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional bathroom integrated within the master bedroom area. Industrial finishes are used with water-resistant materials.

openings.name: Front Entrance Door
openings.description: North-facing door ensuring direct entry to the house in accordance with Vastu and industrial aesthetic, featuring a reinforced steel design.

openings.name: Balcony Door
openings.description: Small opening leading to a balcony on the living room, allowing for outdoor access and fresh air.

vastu_considerations: North-facing entrance aligns with Vastu for prosperity and success.
Library placed in the north zone to enhance knowledge flow and creativity.
Separation of living areas from bedrooms maintains balance between activity and rest.
industrial_design_elements: Exposed brick walls, steel beams, raw finishes.
Open plan layout with functional spatial relationships.
Integration of modern amenities with minimalist industrial style.
